chunk:
Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Facial Cleanser

Brand: Aveeno

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Carrageenan, Sodium Chloride

Directions: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circul

in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.Questions? 866-428-3366; Outside US, dial collect 215-273-8755 www.aveeno.com

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
